Quite a fun game even though it is fairly old now. It's fun to play with others even though some of them can be frustrating, if you can look past that - I think you will enjoy this game. It's nothing mind blowing but it's a good way to kill time in any case. :P

KillingFloor is the best survival co-op game I've ever played! I'm playing it now for 442 hours and it's still making fun. The Graphic isn't bad on highest details but not the best. There are also custom server's where you can play up to 32 players in one lobby! In this game you have to survive 10 waves to reach the endboss ! The Patriarch ! and there are very different zombies, go and try this game man, you won't be dissapointed.
This game right here, is awesome. Completely and utterly, awesome. Great graphics, great sound. And most of all, great guns!

Отличная игра! Всем советую.....ну, если вы любите выносить зомбям мозги...ну и стишок который бы подошел к этой игре 


     Зомби Прут со всех Сторон !
Нервы , Трепет , Вой и Стон
Плоть в Куски , Повсюду Мясо
Ужас в Жилах , Нету Спаса

Шанс на жизнь почти на Грани 
Кровь Ручьём на поле Брани
Скушать рвутся , Окружают
Не Спастись , Кольцо Сужают

Паника ! Нервишки сдали !
Некуда бежать !!! Зажали !!!

В спину впились когти резко
Сильно Нечисть прихватил
Спереди другой кусает 
Оторваться нету сил ...

Всё походу я здесь слил ...

Но вдруг Слышен звук Калашный
Помпыч рядом Безшабашный
Выручать спешат Друзья !
Ведь погибнуть нам нельзя !

Головы вдруг Повалились
Блеск металла Режет Взор
Тут Берсекер Резво скачет
А в руках Большой Топор

Пробежал , Попрыгал Шустро 
Как Дровишки порубил
Дровосекову забаву 
на Катану заменил

И пошел махать как Ниндзя 
Отсекая части тел
Зомби стали рассыпаться
А он даже не вспотел ...

Взрывы , Грохот , Дым Столбом
Подрывник не за Бугром
Точно минами Стреляет
Зомби в Клочья Разрывает 

Словно Артобстрел начался
Дрожь Земли , Огонь кругом
Он с Ручным Гранатомётом
Заправляет Торжеством 

Вот и Прорвано Кольцо 
Коридор почти открыт 
Но Здоровье на Нуле
К нам на помощь Медик мчит

Медик это по простецки
А вообще он Военврач
Пистолеты-пулемёты
Он Жонглирует Трюкач

Ловко он Стреляет Метко
В Пулях у него Таблетка
Подлечил и Спас Братишка
Ну теперь Мутантам крышка

Лязг затворов , перезарядка
Головы врага все Всмятку
Разлетаются в куски 
В Щепки Кости и Мозги

Всем Друзьям Спасибо скажем 
Ведь без них бы нам Конец 
С ними мы в Огонь и в Воду !
Закалённый Брат Боец !

Jogo simples, mas muito viciante!
Basicamente você tem 2 modos de jogo o objetivo e o modo wave.
No modo objetivo você cumprira... er... objetivos no mapa enquanto hordas de zumbis procuram seu corpo nu.
Porém a maior parte do tempo você jogará o modo wave, em que em cada round você e até mais 5 pessoas, matarão determinados números de zumbis.
Existem diversas classes e modos de vencer a depender delas, um especialista em pistolas e rifles, especialista em armas corpo a corpo, especialista em cura, etc e etc. Cada classe tem lvls de 1-6 que podem ser upadas conforme você mata bichos melhorando ainda mais seu potencial de sobrevivencia.
Além disto o jogo é super leve rodando até mesmo nas piores churrasqueiras e até em algumas calculadoras (se pá até em relogios)
Com amigos a diversão é ainda maior!
Com mais de 90h de gameplay só posso dizer que recomendo.

And most importantly, it teaches you to work together on all these stunning visual maps to take down hoards of "zombies".

Nazi Zombie mode but better. The different mutant classes keep you challenged, and the various wweapons and classes give lots of ways to play. There are also tons of really good maps tp play on. Best when played with friends, but certainly fun alone too.

Summary: It’s a co-op survival horror game. Up to 6 players in online co-op mode, or just you, on your own, playing the Solo mode. The aim - cleanse each area of zombies, in waves, until you get to the last one. The Big One. The Patriarch. Then exterminate him, too. Actually, they aren’t "zombies". They are the left-over "specimens" from a cheap and dirty government program to clone soldier-monsters. The basic ones will just munch on your arm and try to disembowel you. The bigger ones were the first ones they tried arming. Nothing much. Just a chainsaw or a blade for starters. They had just got on to the chain gun and rockets when the government tried to secretly shut down their secret program. But, in the typical way these things go, the program didn’t want to be shut down. The specimens got loose. No-one was left alive to turn off the specimen-cloning equipment. And now they are running amok. Well, some of them are running amok. Others are shambling amok or even jumping amok, but you get the idea. The police were sent in, but that wasn't even a challenge for the specimens. The first army units hadn't been warned what to expect. The screams of its got a bloody chainsaw!" over the radios probably didn’t do much for morale, as whole units were chewed up. Quite literally, in some cases, of course. And now, there is just you. And a few friends. The few survivors from the first police and army units thrown in. Of course, you can’t tell anyone anything, because that would be a breach of the Official Secrets Act 1911, 1920, 1989. And that would be a disciplinary offense. So just get in there and do your bit for Queen and Country. Zombies. Lots of them. Big ones, little ones. Armed and Dangerous.

Yes Yes Yes! This game is amazing. Credit goes to TechnoDawg for giving me a free guest pass to try it out, and telling me about the flare revolvers, because those guns with the firebug class are just OP as hell. Things i like about this game the most:
the fact that its not like CoD zombies, where its pretty much impossible to win, you can use different guns even if you're not using that class, the 'favorites' tab in the trader menu, so you don't have to search for your favorite gun and waste precious seconds before the next round, and the maps. I don't have a lot of time into this game, but i can tell that I'm going to be playing a lot. I played the guest time thinking "Ugh just another zombie game to play" but by the end of that time i thought "my god, what has my friend found that could be so epic into one action packed zombie killing game?"

Во-первых, хочу сказать, что эта игра - одна из лучших зомби-игр, в которые я играл!


Скажу кратко, но по делу.
1. Брутальность. Да она просто зашкаливает. Вы идете вчетвером (например) на орду зомби, кто с топором, кто с огнеметом, кто со старым добрым АК. Мясо, куски, металл.
2. Музыка. Я очень полюбил музыку из Killing floor. Она просто великолепно, на мой взгляд, вписывается в жаркие зомбовые побоища; атмосферность музыки +10.
3. Командная работа. Ну вот хрен Вы выживите в одиночку на высоких уровнях сложности. Взаимоподдержка - весомая часть гемплея в Killing floor.
4. Разнообразие карт.
5. Большое кол-во интересных ачивок.
6. Весомый арсенал. От ножа до базуки.
7. Это не просто отстрел тупоголовых зомби. Это реальное противостояние нежити с брутальными мужиками.

Спасибо разработчикам.

And if that doesn't tantalize your trigger fingure, fan made maps are sure to put the spin  on your zombie killing mary-go-round.

This game is great.   It is a zombie survival game, with the wave style that CoD zombies had.

Pros:
- Amazing to play with friends
- Distinct classes, with very different pros and cons
- Distinct weapons, with very different sights, effects, and special effects. (Auto/Semi machine guns)
- Different holiday skins (Hillybilly, X-mas, Circus)
- Tons of maps, and some people create their own, with different play styles required
- Perks that you can level up, that offer some progression in the game
- Challenging enemies, that require you to work with your team
- Even in death, allies can spectate and call out nearby enemies (it's a team game of course)
- High replay value, highly addivtive with friends

Cons:
- Decent Graphics, but on the bright side, even low end computers can run this with no problem, and no lag.
- You're supposed to work together, but allies can troll by welding doors (which can be unwelded at a faster speed)
- Not much fun alone, but you can play with randoms and friends
- Can be very challenging to complete all rounds/kill the Patriarch (Final Boss) at low perk levels


Most of the cons have bright sides to them, and I recommend this game highly.  They have constant sales for all your DLC needs, and even the main game is only $20.  Have Fun :D
This game is amazing(: 11/10

Ce jeu, à mon humble avis de joueur lambda, est un petit bijou dans le domaine du FPS zombi ! De nombreuses maps différentes et de nombreuses classes avec chacunes des caractéristiques bien spécifiques et qui se complètent parfaitement in game, que vous pouvez d'ailleurs up de level avec l'expérience obtenue pour avoir des avantages en début de partie. Par exemple, un Pyro, au grade 5 sur 6, commencera avec un kevlar et un lance-flammes, autant dire que ça aide. Et les classes sont toutes plus jouissives les unes des autres. 
Les graphismes ne sont pas tout récent mais on s'en fou, c'est propre, c'est drôle, et il n'y a pas de bugs, c'est tout ce qu'il compte. Et puis, les zombies sont comme il faut, pas tellement de types différents mais ça suffit, je vous laisse les découvrir par vous même, vous reconnaîtrez vite ceux à ne pas affronter seul !
Bref n'hésitez pas, il vaut vraiment le coup, et il est souvent en soldes depuis quelques temps donc raison de plus.
 Ha, et un dernier gros point positif, la communauté ! Toujours des joueurs solidaires qui n'hésite pas à vous soigner et à vous donner quelques billets pour vous acheter un fusil pour la manche suivante ! Que du bon en tout cas, je vous laisse découvrir les détails, les maps communautaires, les armes dlc (sait on jamais) et j'en passe.. vous avez de quoi faire ! Bon jeu !

Fun game, especially with friends. I got it when the price was 75% off, and it was totally worth getting. In summer and winter, the enemies change and little events are added. Highly addictive and amazing, but it is a bit DLC heavy (and the price for the DLC can be quite obscenely high. 7€ for four extra guns, or different gun appearances? Plz...).

Ricordo, che, quando acquistai Killing floor, c'erano gli sconti di Halloween, e che, per tre euro mi aggiudicai la beta di questo gioco, non ci giocai molto, dopotutto ancora non avevo amici che possedevano KF, ma dopo qualche tempo, riesco a convincere il mio gruppetto ad acquistarlo seppur, quel poco che avevo giocato non mi aveva convinto, ma rigiocandolo in compagnia e con la versione non più in beta, sono riuscito ad apprezzare al massimo questo gioco che ti può dare parecchie ore di divertimento con amici, quindi, lo consiglio vivamente a tutti coloro che amano il genere fps con nemici che arrivano ad ondate, isomma, un bel gioco nato come mod che poi diventa indipendente, non può essere che un ottimo acquisto!
